name: Grandma Gets Revenge
description:
Grandma Gets Revenge

Grandma has been run over by reindeer one too many times— and it's time she gets her revenge. In the song Grandma Got Run Over by a Reindeer, by Elmo & Patsy, Santa murders a beloved Grandma through his reckless sleigh driving. This time, Grandma is fighting back, punching her way through hordes of elves and reindeer to give Santa much needed payback.

Controls

WASD to Move

SPACE / LEFT MOUSE to attack

Gameplay

Grandma Gets Revenge Demo - YouTube
